post.content:
The seed to the field of Minecraft’s fabled Herobrine has been stumbled on.

The seed used to be stumbled on final week by andrew_555, aka Kminster, who kicked off their search on 5th September, 2020. Kminster admitted it “maybe about 50 hours in total for growing/writing the code”, nonetheless indirectly stumbled upon the field on 16th January.

“Ever for the explanation that main Herobrine Creepypasta, of us have faked his world a pair of cases”, teases the video description (survey below). “So we outdated our seed cracking data from Pack.png and the Minecraft panoramas to procure the seed once and for all!”

“Indicate that Herobrine is no longer proper and has never been, here is correct the seed outdated for the common creepypasta image,” a Minecraft moderator reminds posters on Reddit.

To circulate to yourself listed below are the principle points, despite the incontrovertible reality that time to you can be in a position to have Minecraft Java Edition with “historical variations” activated. Preserve version a1.0.16 and articulate this data, or download this ready world file (thanks, PC Gamer):

  • Seed: 478868574082066804
  • Model: Java Alpha 1.0.16_02
  • Alpha coordinates: X=5.06 Y=71 (72.62 scrutinize pos) Z=-298.54
    • Digicam attitude: RX=93.75 RY=-1.2
